content.question:
A difficult conversation

Consurgitur ex consilio; comprehenduntcomprehendo, -ere: join hands with utrumque et orant ne sua dissensione et pertinaciapertinacia, -ae, f.: stubbornness rem in summum periculum deducant: facilem esse rem, seu maneant, seu proficiscantur, si modo unum omnes sentiant ac probent;probo, -are: approve contracontra: on the other hand in dissensione nullam se salutem perspicere.

Bellum Gallicum 5.31

Translate the passage above as literally as possible.
